Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Ridgeland
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Ridgeland due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Ridgeland due to police activity.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Reroute at 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line
ShortDescription: 55 Garfield buses are rr via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn & 55th, due to police activity nr 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Prairie, 59th, King Drive, Midway Plaisance, Woodlawn, then resume their normal route on 55th, due to police activity near 55th/Cottage Grove-Garfield Red Line.

Allow extra travel time.
